casebody.data:
No. 10-6090. Kimberly Albright-Lazzari, et vir, Petitioners v. Susan L. Hamilton, Commissioner, Connecticut Department of Children and Families. 562 U.S. 998, 131 S. Ct. 516,

178 L. Ed. 2d 365,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8371. November 1, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari *366to the Appellate Court of Connecticut dismissed. See Rule 39.8.

Same case below, 120 Conn. App. 376, 991 A.2d 696.
